data.persona: I am looking for a new place to live.  I have been to many places.  My life is on the road and I like it what way.
data.description:
You are in the Clergyman's office.
It is a very small and sparse office with little decoration. It has a simple wooden table, and a cross on the wall. There are two chairs. There are many old prayer books on a single shelf.
There's some ink, a desk, some chairs, a lamp, a single shelf, an old prayer books, a simple wooden table, some paper, a wooden table, a shelf, some prayer books, and a cross here.
A priest is here.

You are carrying a jug that holds the wine the servants fill glasses with, a compass, and a tattered map, wearing a ceremonial hat and a belt, and wielding a sword and a hammer.
